name: High-Speed Universal Broadband Services CIC
goal: HUBS is a not-for-profit membership organisation of community network operators. Its purpose is to facilitate operation at scale through collective purchasing and pooling of engineering resources. HUBS enables its members to fully participate in the Internet.
interests: Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Infrastructure provision and digital inclusion
Privacy and security
